1: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> לְדָוִ֣ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> מִזְמ֑וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> תְ֝הִלָּתִ֗י <sup>8416 </sup> <n>of my praise</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֶּחֱרַֽשׁ׃ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>Hold not thy peace</n>
2: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> פִ֪י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>For the mouth</n> רָשָׁ֡ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> וּֽפִי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>and the mouth</n> מִ֭רְמָה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>of the deceitful</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> פָּתָ֑חוּ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>are opened</n> דִּבְּר֥וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>against me they have spoken</n> אִ֝תִּ֗י <sup>854 </sup> <n>against</n> לְשׁ֣וֹן <sup>3956 </sup> <n>tongue</n> שָֽׁקֶר׃ <sup>8267 </sup> <n>against me with a lying</n>
3: וְדִבְרֵ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>me about also with words</n> שִׂנְאָ֣ה <sup>8135 </sup> <n>of hatred</n> סְבָב֑וּנִי <sup>5437 </sup> <n>They compassed</n> וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֥וּנִי <sup>3898 </sup> <n>and fought</n> חִנָּֽם׃ <sup>2600 </sup> <n>against me without a cause</n>
4: תַּֽחַת־ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>return</n> אַהֲבָתִ֥י <sup>160 </sup> <n>For my love</n> יִשְׂטְנ֗וּנִי <sup>7853 </sup> <n>they are my adversaries</n> וַאֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> תְפִלָּֽה׃ <sup>8605 </sup> <n>but I [give myself unto] prayer</n>
5: וַיָּ֘שִׂ֤ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And they have rewarded</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> רָ֭עָה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>me evil</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> טוֹבָ֑ה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>for good</n> וְ֝שִׂנְאָ֗ה <sup>8135 </sup> <n>and hatred</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> אַהֲבָתִֽי׃ <sup>160 </sup> <n>for my love</n>
6: הַפְקֵ֣ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>Set</n> עָלָ֣יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רָשָׁ֑ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>thou a wicked man</n> וְ֝שָׂטָ֗ן <sup>7854 </sup> <n>over him and let Satan</n> יַעֲמֹ֥ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stand</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>at his right hand</n>
7: בְּ֭הִשָּׁ֣פְטוֹ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>When he shall be judged</n> יֵצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>let him be</n> רָשָׁ֑ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>condemned</n> וּ֝תְפִלָּת֗וֹ <sup>8605 </sup> <n>and let his prayer</n> תִּהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לַֽחֲטָאָֽה׃ <sup>2401 </sup> <n>become sin</n>
8: יִֽהְיֽוּ־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>Let</n> יָמָ֥יו <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Let his days</n> מְעַטִּ֑ים <sup>4592 </sup> <n>be few</n> פְּ֝קֻדָּת֗וֹ <sup>6486 </sup> <n>his office</n> יִקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take</n> אַחֵֽר׃ <sup>312 </sup> <n>[and] let another</n>
9: יִֽהְיוּ־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>Let</n> בָנָ֥יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Let his children</n> יְתוֹמִ֑ים <sup>3490 </sup> <n>be fatherless</n> וְ֝אִשְׁתּוֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>and his wife</n> אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <sup>490 </sup> <n>a widow</n>
10: וְנ֤וֹעַ <sup>5128 </sup> <n>be continually</n> יָנ֣וּעוּ <sup>5128 </sup> <n>vagabonds</n> בָנָ֣יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Let his children</n> וְשִׁאֵ֑לוּ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>and beg</n> וְ֝דָרְשׁ֗וּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>let them seek</n> מֵחָרְבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>2723 </sup> <n>[their bread] also out of their desolate places</n>
11: יְנַקֵּ֣שׁ <sup>5367 </sup> <n>catch</n> נ֭וֹשֶׁה <sup>5383 </sup> <n>Let the extortioner</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> ל֑וֹ וְיָבֹ֖זּוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>spoil</n> זָרִ֣ים <sup>2114 </sup> <n>all that he hath and let the strangers</n> יְגִיעֽוֹ׃ <sup>3018 </sup> <n>his labour</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
12: ל֭וֹ מֹשֵׁ֣ךְ <sup>4900 </sup> <n>Let there be none to extend</n> חָ֑סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>mercy</n> וְֽאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>Let there be none</n> יְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ח֝וֹנֵ֗ן <sup>2603 </sup> <n>unto him neither let there be any to favour</n> לִיתוֹמָֽיו׃ <sup>3490 </sup> <n>his fatherless children</n>
13: יְהִֽי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>Let</n> אַחֲרִית֥וֹ <sup>319 </sup> <n>Let his posterity</n> לְהַכְרִ֑ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>be cut off</n> בְּד֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>[and] in the generation</n> אַ֝חֵ֗ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>following</n> יִמַּ֥ח <sup>4229 </sup> <n>be blotted out</n> שְׁמָֽם׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>let their name</n>
14: יִזָּכֵ֤ר ׀ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>be remembered</n> עֲוֹ֣ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>Let the iniquity</n> אֲ֭בֹתָיו <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his fathers</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>with the LORD</n> וְחַטַּ֥את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>and let not the sin</n> אִ֝מּ֗וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>of his mother</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תִּמָּֽח׃ <sup>4229 </sup> <n>be blotted out</n>
15: יִהְי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>Let</n> נֶֽגֶד־ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>them be before</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Let them be before the LORD</n> תָּמִ֑יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> וְיַכְרֵ֖ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>that he may cut off</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of them from the earth</n> זִכְרָֽם׃ <sup>2143 </sup> <n>the memory</n>
16: יַ֗עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> זָכַר֮ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Because that he remembered</n> עֲשׂ֪וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>not to shew</n> חָ֥סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>mercy</n> וַיִּרְדֹּ֡ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>but persecuted</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> עָנִ֣י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>the poor</n> וְ֭אֶבְיוֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>and needy</n> וְנִכְאֵ֨ה <sup>5218 </sup> <n>broken</n> לֵבָ֬ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>in heart</n> לְמוֹתֵֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that he might even slay</n>
17: וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>As he loved</n> קְ֭לָלָה <sup>7045 </sup> <n>cursing</n> וַתְּבוֹאֵ֑הוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>so let it come</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> חָפֵ֥ץ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>unto him as he delighted</n> בִּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה <sup>1293 </sup> <n>not in blessing</n> וַתִּרְחַ֥ק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>so let it be far</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
18: וַיִּלְבַּ֥שׁ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>As he clothed</n> קְלָלָ֗ה <sup>7045 </sup> <n>himself with cursing</n> כְּמַ֫דּ֥וֹ <sup>4055 </sup> <n>like as with his garment</n> וַתָּבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>so let it come</n> כַמַּ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>like water</n> בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>into his bowels</n> וְ֝כַשֶּׁ֗מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>and like oil</n> בְּעַצְמוֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>6106 </sup> <n>into his bones</n>
19: תְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ל֭וֹ כְּבֶ֣גֶד <sup>899 </sup> <n>Let it be unto him as the garment</n> יַעְטֶ֑ה <sup>5844 </sup> <n>[which] covereth</n> וּ֝לְמֵ֗זַח <sup>4206 </sup> <n>him and for a girdle</n> תָּמִ֥יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> יַחְגְּרֶֽהָ׃ <sup>2296 </sup> <n>wherewith he is girded</n>
20: זֹ֤את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <sup>6468 </sup> <n>[Let] this [be] the reward</n> שֹׂ֭טְנַי <sup>7853 </sup> <n>of mine adversaries</n> מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from the LORD</n> וְהַדֹּבְרִ֥ים <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and of them that speak</n> רָ֝֗ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>against my soul</n>
21: וְאַתָּ֤ה ׀ <sup>859 </sup> <n>O</n> יְה֘וִ֤ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>thou for me O GOD</n> אֲדֹנָ֗י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> עֲ‍ֽשֵׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>But do</n> אִ֭תִּי <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> לְמַ֣עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>sake</n> שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>for thy name's</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> ט֥וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[is] good</n> חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>sake because thy mercy</n> הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>deliver</n>
22: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> עָנִ֣י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>For I [am] poor</n> וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>and needy</n> אָנֹ֑כִי <sup>595 </sup> <n>and my</n> וְ֝לִבִּ֗י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>and my heart</n> חָלַ֥ל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>is wounded</n> בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>within</n>
23: כְּצֵל־ <sup>6738 </sup> <n>like the shadow</n> כִּנְטוֹת֥וֹ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>when it declineth</n> נֶהֱלָ֑כְתִּי <sup>1980 </sup> <n>I am gone</n> נִ֝נְעַ֗רְתִּי <sup>5287 </sup> <n>I am tossed up and down</n> כָּֽאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <sup>697 </sup> <n>as the locust</n>
24: בִּ֭רְכַּי <sup>1290 </sup> <n>My knees</n> כָּשְׁל֣וּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>are weak</n> מִצּ֑וֹם <sup>6685 </sup> <n>through fasting</n> וּ֝בְשָׂרִ֗י <sup>1320 </sup> <n>and my flesh</n> כָּחַ֥שׁ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>faileth</n> מִשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <sup>8081 </sup> <n>of fatness</n>
25: וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> הָיִ֣יתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> חֶרְפָּ֣ה <sup>2781 </sup> <n>I became also a reproach</n> לָהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> יִ֝רְא֗וּנִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>unto them [when] they looked</n> יְנִיע֥וּן <sup>5128 </sup> <n>upon me they shaked</n> רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>their heads</n>
26: עָ֭זְרֵנִי <sup>5826 </sup> <n>Help</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>me O LORD</n> אֱלֹהָ֑י <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n> ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <sup>3467 </sup> <n>O save</n> כְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>me according to thy mercy</n>
27: וְֽ֭יֵדְעוּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>That they may know</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יָ֣דְךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>that this [is] thy hand</n> זֹּ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[that] thou LORD</n> עֲשִׂיתָֽהּ׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>hast done</n>
28: יְקַֽלְלוּ־ <sup>7043 </sup> <n>Let them curse</n> הֵמָּה֮ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְאַתָּ֪ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> תְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>but bless</n> קָ֤מוּ ׀ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>thou when they arise</n> וַיֵּבֹ֗שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>let them be ashamed</n> וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>but let thy servant</n> יִשְׂמָֽח׃ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>rejoice</n>
29: יִלְבְּשׁ֣וּ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>be clothed</n> שׂוֹטְנַ֣י <sup>7853 </sup> <n>Let mine adversaries</n> כְּלִמָּ֑ה <sup>3639 </sup> <n>with shame</n> וְיַעֲט֖וּ <sup>5844 </sup> <n>and let them cover</n> כַמְעִ֣יל <sup>4598 </sup> <n>as with a mantle</n> בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ <sup>1322 </sup> <n>themselves with their own confusion</n>
30: א֘וֹדֶ֤ה <sup>3034 </sup> <n>praise</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> מְאֹ֣ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>I will greatly</n> בְּפִ֑י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with my mouth</n> וּבְת֖וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>him among</n> רַבִּ֣ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>the multitude</n> אֲהַֽלְלֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>yea I will praise</n>
31: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יַ֭עֲמֹד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>For he shall stand</n> לִימִ֣ין <sup>3225 </sup> <n>at the right hand</n> אֶבְי֑וֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>of the poor</n> לְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>to save</n> מִשֹּׁפְטֵ֥י <sup>8199 </sup> <n>[him] from those that condemn</n> נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his soul</n>
